bill.summary:
Cady Housh and Jason Flatt Teen Suicide Prevention Act of 2017
This bill amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to require states receiving ESEA funds to establish and implement a youth suicide awareness and prevention policy that provides for an hour of training each school year to school employees.
